authdriver.name: ldap
authdriver.label: CONF_MESSAGE[LDAP/AD Directory]
authdriver.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Authentication datas are stored in an LDAP/AD directory.]

param.name: LDAP_PORT
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[LDAP Port]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[LDAP Server Port (leave blank for default)]

param.name: LDAP_USER
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[LDAP bind username]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Username (uid + dn) of LDAP bind user]

param.name: LDAP_DN
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[People DN]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[DN where the users are stored]

param.name: LDAP_GDN
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Groups DN]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[DN where the groups are stored. Must be used in cunjonction with a group parameter mapping, generally using the memberOf feature.]

param.name: LDAP_GROUPATTR
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Group attribute]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Group main attribute to be used as a label]

param.name: MAPPING_LDAP_PARAM
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[LDAP attribute]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Name of the LDAP attribute to read]

param.name: MAPPING_LOCAL_PARAM
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Plugin parameter]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Name of the custom local parameter to set]

param.name: TEST_USER
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Test User]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Use the Test Connexion button to check if this user is correctly found in your LDAP directory.]
